title: Courgette and potato soup

default: 300ml/½ pint hot chicken stock (vegetarians can substitute vegetable stock)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
handful each fresh chives and parsley, chopped

steps: Heat the butter in a small saucepan, add the courgette, garlic and onion and fry over a gentle heat for four minutes.
Add the potato and stock, season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper and bring to the boil. Simmer for ten minutes, or until the potato is tender.
Stir in the herbs, pour into a bowl and serve.
